thread.title: Obama’s Solution Lies in His Own Advice on Iraq and Syria
thread.title_full: Obama’s Solution Lies in His Own Advice on Iraq and Syria - US News

author: USNews
title: Obama’s Solution Lies in His Own Advice on Iraq and Syria
text:
A Familiar Solution In dealing with Iraq and Syria, some say President Obama should focus on diplomacy. By Paul D. Shinkman Oct. 9, 2015 | 6:00 a.m. EDT
+ More President Barack Obama's plan for Syria and Iraq has been widely criticized for being too narrow, too restrictive and too focused on military gains. Russia, meanwhile, has stolen worldwide attention by elbowing its forces right into the middle of a war America is supposed to be leading.
Opponents say under Obama, America is losing its position in the Middle East. If that's true, it doesn't have to be the case, particularly if Obama were to adopt some of his own advice from earlier in his administration.
Our Paul Shinkman explains:
The Report Thank you, your email has been submitted.
